name: Fragile Fifty
description:
(Best played in full screen!)

Ramming Speed Captain!

An alien fleet is attacking our cities, their force fields can repel even our strongest laser fire...

... luckily for us, their craft aren't the most sturdy machines.

Smash those fragile invaders before it's too late!

This is my entry for RNDGAME JAM 2, the entire game is based on a randomly generated title :D
